question_text.value: I never cough --- I cough all the time
question_text.name: I never cough --- I cough all the time

question_text.value: I have no phlegm (mucus) in my chest at all --- My chest is completely full of phlegm
question_text.name: I have no phlegm (mucus) in my chest at all --- My chest is completely full of phlegm

question_text.value: My chest does not feel tight at all --- My chest feels very tight

option_display.value: I only get breathless with strenuous exercise.
I get short of breath when hurrying on level ground or walking up a slight hill.
On level ground, I walk slower than people of the same age because of breathlessness, or have to stop for breath when walking at my own pace.
I stop for breath after walking about 100 yards or after a few minutes on level ground.
I am too breathless to leave the house or I am breathless when dressing.
